hero.description: a fullstack developer from the picturesque country of the Netherlands, known for its tulip fields, windmills, and innovative technology. I'm passionate about building beautiful, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

modernApps.title: Modern Apps
modernApps.description: I build modern web applications using the latest technologies and best practices. I focus on creating scalable, maintainable, and user-friendly applications.

tailoredDesign.title: Tailored Design
tailoredDesign.description: I design and develop custom web applications tailored to your needs. I focus on creating a unique user experience that aligns with your brand.

seoFriendly.title: SEO Friendly
seoFriendly.description: I build web applications with SEO in mind. I focus on creating applications that are search engine friendly and rank well in search results.

services.title: I handle just about everything
services.description: I offer a wide range of services to help you build, launch, and maintain your web application. From design and development to deployment and maintenance, I've got you covered.

development.title: Development
development.description: I develop custom web applications using the latest technologies and best practices. I focus on creating scalable, maintainable, and user-friendly applications.

design.title: Design
design.description: I design custom web applications tailored to your needs. I focus on creating a unique user experience that aligns with your brand.

deployment.title: Deployment and Hosting
deployment.description: I deploy and host web applications on reliable and secure servers. I focus on creating applications that are fast, reliable, and secure.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: I provide ongoing maintenance and support for web applications. I focus on keeping your application up-to-date, secure, and running smoothly.

fullStack.title: Full Stack Development
fullStack.description: I offer full stack development services, handling both the front-end and back-end of web applications. I focus on creating seamless user experiences and robust server-side logic.

everythingElse.title: Everything Else
everythingElse.description: I offer a wide range of other services to help you build, launch, and maintain your web application. From landing pages, e-commerce or AI powered apps, I've got you covered.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: I'm excited to help you build, launch, and maintain your web application. Let's work together to create something amazing!
